"inate" - A new verb that means to spend a lot of time looking at oneself in the mirror, often to the point of obsession.
"Mirror Me" - A mobile app that uses augmented reality to create a virtual mirror image of the user, allowing them to see what they would look like with different hairstyles, makeup, and clothing.
"Mirror Mirror on the Wall" - A game that uses a mirror as a surface to play a virtual reality game, where the player's reflection becomes the game character.
"Mirror Writing" - A writing style where the words are written backwards, with the reflection of the words in the mirror becoming the text.

"Mirror Universe" - A science fiction universe where everything is a reflection of our own, including the people, objects, and events. The characters must navigate this universe by looking at their reflection to see what is real.
